title: "Artificial Intelligence Used to Assess Deterioration of Retina in Macular Degeneration"
excerpt: "The innovated approach using artificial intelligence, permits in the fully automated measurement of the main atrophic lesions using data from optical coherence tomography, which provides three-dimensional visualization of the structure of the retina to assess deterioration in age-related macular degeneration."
